title: cppcheck errors in examples since ign-math move

content.raw:
The following cppcheck errors have been happening since pull request #2539

~~~
examples/stand_alone/clone_simulation/cloner.cc	64	style	unreadVariable	false	variable 'serverThread' is assigned a value that is never used.
./examples/plugins/model_move/path_publisher.cc	25	warning	build/include_order	false	Found C++ system header after other header. Should be: c system, c++ system, other, path_publisher.h . 
~~~
content.html:
The following cppcheck errors have been happening since pull request #2539

examples/stand_alone/clone_simulation/cloner.cc 64  style   unreadVariable  false   variable 'serverThread' is assigned a value that is never used.
./examples/plugins/model_move/path_publisher.cc 25  warning build/include_order false   Found C++ system header after other header. Should be: c system, c++ system, other, path_publisher.h .
